title: Assignment statements with r s and t

content.question:
Consider the following code segment, which uses the variables r, s, and t.
r ← 1
s ← 2
t ← 3
r ← s
s ← t
DISPLAY (r)
DISPLAY (s)
What is displayed as a result of running the code segment?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
